alhamdulilah.....i manage 2 do d paper jus nw.. boy fetch me.... bad news.....i cant follow boy's family go JB... if i join..dah 6 org..mana nak letak barang2... his mum nak gie giant,buy groceries utk berbulan-bulan nya stock..hahahha pasal tu aku tak leh ikut...haikss.... jumie cant make it lakk 2 d duxton showroom...ada hal...haikss... pe lahh nasib aku nie.... boy send me hm... 2 tired tat i dozed off.... then jumie called up....n we decided 2 meet up @somerset... yati wana get smtin 4 her mum...a birthday gift... went to taka jewellery...get her mum a earing..nice...$129... jumie gt herself a $12 shoes..similar like mine..gd bargain...better quality 2... mine tat time noreen bought 4 me @holiday plaza 50ringgit....i choose myself..... the shoes n bag @holiday plaza JB not bad...quite cheap...d dvd 2... urlLink breko @bugis urlLink we then make our way to breko bugis 2 hav our dinner.... boy join us 4 awhile...after his JB trip...then meet the rugby ppl.. im werkin 16hrs tmr...i decided 2 stay wit d gerls,jumie & yatie... went hm by takin d last train.... reach hm abt 1am...cant sleep... all sleepin soundly..my nenek 2... i gt tis feelin...tat i hv 2 keep looki @ her... dont knw why.... alhamdulilah..tengah tido... arghh...gt only 4hrs...ltr abt 530am kena bangun...kena keje....haikk masi online pulak aku nie.... here some pic lydia80 urlLink nak???? urlLink urlLink d 3 gerls @breko bugis urlLink urlLink glamour Hp...jumie's,mine &yatie urlLink urlLink @bugis mrt....waiting 4 d last train urlLink

2dae is d last of my course...yahooo....... but but but,jgn suka sangat...tmr ada open bk exam... arghhh...baru nak enjoy.... finish lesson early 2dae cos ned 2 prepare 4 tmr open bk exam... boy fetch me hm... he went to rugby training after tat.... mama,mak long,makcik n kak shermin @hm.. memang every fri,d sista will come down 2 visit my nenek yg sakit since 6yrs ago....she is bedriden....half paralysed... 4 6 yrs my family took care of her...she's been suffering.... actually my mum told me tat my nenek mcm lain je.... aku pun selenge....lain mcm mana ah...aikss took me few min 2 tangkap... ohh...nowadays, my nenek diam je....her right hand tak bergerak sangat.. selalunya tangan dia tu suka capai2 korek sana korek sini... but lain lahhh...mcm lain...how 2 explain eh... i saw it wit my veri own eyes... memang lain.... kakadang tu we saw tears comin out fm her eyes.... sedih...pilu.... ya allah...pls let her go....dah lama dia suffer... nurse yg slalu datang rumah require ask 2 send my nenek 2 hospital..utk potong kaki dia... gila2......gila2... sudahlahh org tua tu dah merana...dia suruh potong kaki.... aduuhhhh... my mum tak kasi....so is my maklong n makcik... dgn lincah i call sarina.... ask her 2 come down here.... pak long came down 2.... kak shermin fetch abg romi here...abg aryie came down after werk ... all turun...to visit my nenekk... sorrow..... baca2 sikit.... i force myself to flip tru my notes... cant concentrate lah....tinkin of my nenek.... sok nak ikut boy gie jb tak???hmmm...tengok dulu lahhh.... bawak je passport..jus in case.... ehh actually nak kena jumpa jumie gie tengok showroom pinnacle @duxtan im quite interested lahh...okokok lookin forward tmr... i pray for nenek..insyallah takde pe2... gd luck 2 me 4 my exam tmr.... lydia80 urlLink Pinnacle@Duxtan urlLink urlLink 5 room urlLink urlLink S1-1C2 Apartment(95Sqm) urlLink

after much help fm some parties, i manage to fax n email tis complain letter to the management of pasta fresca..here it goes.....till now there's no reply fm them!!wat d fucked???? 25th June 2004 Pasta Fresca Shaw House Branch 350 Orchard Road, Shaw House Isetan Scotts, Level 4 Singapore 238868 RE: Complain On Service Delivery Dear Customer Service Manager, On 23rd June 2004 about 715pm, my boyfriend and I was looking forward to our regular monthly dose of your mouth-watering pastas at your restaurant at Shaw House Building, Level 4. However, I am very disappointed because the service provided by one of your male staff was extremely unsatisfactory and discriminative. As usual, we were eagerly queing outside your restaurant, awaiting to be seated. We were the only customer in the queue and noticed that there were ample seats available in the restaurant. We waited for more than 5 mins but none of the staffs acknowledge our presence. Shortly after, a chinese couple joined the queue and was immediately acknowledged and served by the male staff mentioned above. I was shocked by the preferential service given to the chinese couple. I kindly reminded the staff that I was in the queue first. I was expecting an apology from the staff but he simply gave us an "irritated look" and pointed us a table. We went towards our table reluctantly and decided to leave because of the fear of bad service. We felt humiliated and insulted because the chinese couple mentioned above laughed upon our departure, with the impression that we are the typical "kiasu singaporean". As a regular customer, I have been supporting and spreading positive word of mouth on your restaurant. I am concern about the way your service staff treat customers on the basis of their race. I hope you will take the necessary actions, to ensure this incident will not repeat for potential and regular customers. I thank you for your attention on regards to this incident. I wish your restaurant all the best. Yours sincerely, Lydia Binte Abdul Sarip

urlLink Toyota Motor Corporation and Daihatsu Motor Co., Ltd., (Daihatsu) announced today the nationwide(Japan) launch of a jointly developed compact car that will be sold by Toyota as the Passo (Italian for "step" or "footstep", creating the image of a car that is light and easy to drive) through "Toyota Corolla" dealers and by Daihatsu as the Boon (A sound that Japanese children use to imitate a car, creating the image of a fun car for the family to use) through the nationwide Daihatsu Dealer Group. The new vehicle, the first to have been jointly developed for the Japanese market by TMC and Daihatsu, was realized through a combination of the strengths of each company-Toyota's automobile development technology and quality control strength and Daihatsu's small car development technology and production expertise. urlLink

fishy business going on again...last monday was our usual session of seafood. e last i went was the branch at TM. tat was like 2 mths ago...oiii..sinful tak visit2 mereka! i was at suntec's FISH & CO when i saw ernie. wanted to say hi but somehow i was afraid i got the wrong person..it was her, another fellow blogger who happened to be my sis's friend from la salle. so i had seafood platter. was chomping happily when the squids came out funny in my mouth. being the complain queen i was, called for the staff and asked "WTF is wrong with the sotong, man?" ya rite, no lah, i was more polite... they claimed it was something to do wtih the spices but i know my food, pantat!!! wanted to change for us to the calamari but we declined coz it got the better of us they could play some tricky business like spitting in our food? hahahhahaha...how silly rite? but i believe if u offend someone in the food business, u better think twice of complaining. either u complain before eating, dun eat at all(ask for refund!) or cabut somewhere else. had to urge boy to get home and rest coz he's started his nursing course..dat man needs to be reminded constantly! no more hanging out till late, need to wake up early for lectures, no menggatal with underageds, no bonceng2 of the minahs, no this and no that! dah nak tunang eh, so dun try to be funny. no monkey or fishy business here!!! On tuesday after my lessons, didnt have any plans. boy called unexpectedly and asked to go in JB for petrol top up. so he had to go down to my place to take my passport. but damn, i was wearing a skirt that day and i reminded him to take a long a pair of jeans. in the end, he didnt take the jeans! was so damned pissed seh, coz i had to take the bike with the SKIRT! he consoled me saying tat i would look 'sexy'..puit! it's not abt being sexy but if u ride long roads, it would gonna get chilly and wearing the damn skirt doesnt help lor....and of coz it looks unsightly to show off the legs on the bike wat...no pun intended....the four of us,isky,izam,boy n me had our supper @Singgah Selalu...craving for ice cream crepe,but siak tak buka!bingit gua!! Wednesday nyer criter pulak....woken up by thomas to replace jumie at exxonmobil for last nite's witnessing. duhh..there goes my sleep but its alright coz got extra money. moreover, no nid to go in for my shift if the testing didnt end in time for my afternoon shift. took the trusted laptop along just in case if i was clueless wat to do while waiting. then the most brilliant idea came to my head. "rubs hands inn glee", i decided to leave for "lunch" and headed to do some shopping spree! i reached to bugis... here's the list of wat i got! 1) pink shoes from bata 2) esprit pink coloured top 3) esprit tote bag 4) esprit beach thong..yeah slippers..not that thong thong. wat's with all the pink fetish anyway? had my loner lunch at breko. chicken spaghetti. yeah, alone ah..while waiting for boy to finish his lecture at NYP. fun rite my job? i thk we're some of the lucky ones to get such a job. alhamdullilah! the trusted laptop works its magic and became my companion for the day. was surfing on this 'hantu' pics taken during the last weekend at sentosa. brought my digi cam to cam whore ALONE! ya, call me perasan but i loike!!! dinner was pasir panjang for more seafood! stingray la, lala la, snails la, chut chut la and whatnots with the gila couple, ijad n mimi. one of my favourite pastimes if u ppl realized, shopping and eating. ask me for nice makan, 1st person to ask, definitely ask me. ready to try, ready to eat, ready to spend!after makan, meet the rest of the rugby ppl @adam road....sab,adam,joanna,isky n jaz. then hm sweet hm.... lydia80

Dear Lydia, Thank you for taking time off your busy schedule to provide us with the feedback on the quality of our service. We are very apologetic that you had received such inadequate and sub standard customer service. In regards to your feedback about the service procedure of the restaurant ( queue), I have highlighted this to the restaurant manager, and I ensure you that we have taken steps to shorten the waiting period for customers to be served. We have conducted staff training modules to educate and equip them with the necessary skills, knowledge and attitude to serve our valuable customers better. Pasta Fresca Da Salvatore have NO preferential treatment regardless of race, religion or gender. I express my deepest apologies to you and your boyfriend, if both of you felt offended because of the indifferent treatment received due to your ethnic background. Please rest assure that we condone such practices in Pasta Fresca Da Salvatore. Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to improve our dedication to you. We hope to see you soon at Pasta Fresca Da Salvatore. I leave you with this famous Italian proverb: Sbaliando s'impara Which means: One learns from his mistakes Ciao Regards, Jan Faizal Sales & Marketing Off: 6778 0401 Fax: 67795384 H/P:98554344 website: www.pastafresca.com This email is confidential and may contain information that is privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify us by return mail and delete the mail from your system immediately. Any unauthorised dissemination or copying of this email or any part of the contents herein is prohibited. All rights are strictly reserved.
